alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Cape May; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 27 at 3:22PM EDT until September 28 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level is expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the New Jersey counties of Atlantic, Cape May and Cumberland. * WHEN...Until 1:00 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels will remain elevated into the weekend, with minor or near minor tidal flooding possible with the nighttime high tides on Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Maurice River at Bivalve MLLW Categories - Minor 7.6 ft, Moderate 8.6 ft, Major 9.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 27/08 PM 8.2 1.9 1.2 Minor 28/09 AM 7.1 0.8 0.8 None 28/09 PM 8.0 1.7 1.0 Minor 29/10 AM 7.6 1.3 1.0 Minor 29/10 PM 7.9 1.6 1.0 Minor 30/11 AM 7.7 1.4 1.0 Minor Atlantic Ocean at Atlantic City MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 27/07 PM 6.6 2.0 1.2 Minor 28/07 AM 5.8 1.2 1.0 None 28/07 PM 6.5 1.9 1.2 Minor 29/08 AM 6.4 1.8 1.2 Minor 29/08 PM 6.3 1.7 1.1 Minor 30/09 AM 6.6 2.0 1.2 Minor Great Egg Harbor Bay at Ocean City MLLW Categories - Minor 5.3 ft, Moderate 6.3 ft, Major 7.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 27/07 PM 5.9 1.9 0.9 Minor 28/08 AM 5.1 1.1 0.6 None 28/08 PM 5.8 1.8 0.8 Minor 29/08 AM 5.6 1.6 0.8 Minor 29/09 PM 5.7 1.7 0.8 Minor 30/09 AM 5.8 1.8 0.8 Minor Cape May Harbor at Cape May MLLW Categories - Minor 6.2 ft, Moderate 7.2 ft, Major 8.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.1 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 27/07 PM 7.1 2.0 1.1 Minor 28/08 AM 6.2 1.1 0.8 Minor 28/08 PM 7.0 1.9 1.0 Minor 29/08 AM 6.6 1.5 0.9 Minor 29/09 PM 6.8 1.7 0.9 Minor 30/09 AM 7.0 1.9 1.0 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
